proposal1.heroHeadline: Lesia is burning 200 hours a year on proposals. Here is exactly where it goes.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Right now, proposals take hours from your design work. With our system, they‚Äôre done in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Every minute spent on manual proposals is a drain on Lesia's resources.

problems.title: Wasted Design Time
problems.description: Lesia spends over 200 hours annually crafting proposals. Each hour here is an hour not spent transforming web experiences.

problems.title: Lost Revenue Opportunities
problems.description: For every delayed proposal, Lesia risks losing potential clients. This means thousands in lost revenue annually.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Manual efforts lead to proposal inconsistencies. Each inconsistency can confuse clients and lessen brand trust.

problems.title: High Stress Levels
problems.description: Lesia's small team is stretched thin, causing stress. Stress impacts creativity, which is essential for exceptional design.

problems.title: Inefficient Follow-Ups
problems.description: Without tracking, follow-ups are hit or miss. This inefficiency can cost Lesia potential business.

problems.title: Missed Client Insights
problems.description: Manual research misses key client details. Missing these insights means proposals lack the personal touch that sets Lesia apart.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces these losses with efficiency and precision.

solutions.title: Instant Proposals
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours of manual work. Our system delivers in under 60 seconds, freeing up design time.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual creation leads to branding mishaps. Our system ensures every proposal is perfectly branded and consistent.

solutions.title: Automated Follow-Ups
solutions.description: Following up is currently a guessing game. Our solution tracks interactions, ensuring timely and effective follow-ups.

solutions.title: Client Insights
solutions.description: Manual research misses details. Our AI finds and integrates client insights, making each proposal deeply personalized.

solutions.title: Reduced Stress
solutions.description: Proposal creation adds stress to your team. Our system handles the heavy lifting, allowing Lesia to focus on creativity.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Lesia's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Lesia around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Lesia.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Boost Your Business with Lesia's Exceptional Design Expertise
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Partner with us to transform your digital presence through impactful, user-focused design strategies.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently experiencing significant losses due to missed opportunities.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves your site without converting is revenue walking out the door. You are currently losing 30% potential sales.

problems.title: User Engagement Loss
problems.description: Visitors spend less than two minutes on your platform. This results in a 25% decrease in customer retention.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Inconsistent branding across your digital channels leads to a 20% loss in brand trust and recognition.

problems.title: Inefficient UX Design
problems.description: Complex navigation leads to frustrated users. This accounts for a 35% increase in site abandonment.

problems.title: Mobile Responsiveness Issues
problems.description: Non-responsive design on mobile devices results in losing 40% of mobile traffic.

problems.title: SEO Performance Decline
problems.description: Poorly optimized content leads to a drop in search rankings, losing 15% of organic traffic monthly.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our solutions are designed to directly address these critical losses.

solutions.title: UX Design
solutions.description: We enhance user experience to improve engagement and conversion rates. Your website will be intuitive and user-friendly.

solutions.title: Responsive Web Design
solutions.description: Our designs ensure your site looks great on all devices, capturing mobile users and reducing bounce rates.

solutions.title: SEO Optimization
solutions.description: We optimize your content and site structure to improve search rankings and increase organic traffic.

solutions.title: Brand Strategy
solutions.description: We create a consistent brand image across all platforms, enhancing recognition and trust.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: At Lesia, we turn your vision into reality with our expert design services.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team has successfully completed over 100 projects, transforming businesses just like yours.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Solutions
whyUsCards.description: We stay ahead of design trends to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Approach
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with you to ensure your goals are met and exceeded.

whyUsCards.title: Results-Driven
whyUsCards.description: Our focus is on delivering measurable outcomes that drive your business forward.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the dedicated team behind your project's success.

team.name: Lesia Payne
team.role: Company Owner And Lead Ux Designer
team.bio: Lesia leads strategy and client relationships with a keen eye for design and a passion for user experience. Her leadership ensures projects exceed expectations.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Research
process.description: We dive deep into understanding your needs and market context.

process.title: Design & Prototyping
process.description: We create design concepts and prototypes to align with your vision.

process.title: Development & Testing
process.description: Our technical team brings the design to life, ensuring functionality.

process.title: Launch & Optimization
process.description: We launch your project and continuously optimize for performance.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose an investment option that aligns with your growth goals.

pricing.name: Starter Package
pricing.description: Ideal for businesses seeking foundational improvements.

pricing.name: Growth Package
pricing.description: Recommended for businesses aiming for significant growth.

pricing.name: Enterprise Package
pricing.description: Perfect for enterprises seeking complete transformation.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's chat about how we can work together to achieve your goals.
proposal2.footerSub: Designing a better web for everyone.

lead.company_description:
We partner for postive change. 

We work with partners whose mission we connect with‚Äîwho are working to make the world better. For the past decade, we have put our time and expertise as designers, developers and UX strategists towards improving our community and giving back wherever we can.

We don't just design websites. We create valuable tools and information that your customers, clients and staff can actually use.

Whether we are doing graphic design or web development, our focus is usability so anyone can find what they are looking for, fast. Putting users first helps them find your website and helps your business grow.

Services include:
Responsive website design
User Experience (UX) design
Wireframing
Art direction
Logo design
Print graphic design
Signage and display design
Business card design
Packaging design
Trade show booth and banner design
Custom web development 
Customized Squarespace Websites
Information Architecture
Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
User-testing
Tree testing
QA testing
Website & usability audits
Web applications
Mobile web applications
